nodes.text: The Witches Horn was a cliff on the planet Dathomir, found at the Treacherous Approach. A face was carved into the cliff, something that was common for Nightsister structures. On the top was a room filled with many Nightsister relics, where Nightsisters would go and practice magicks together. Under the cliff was a cave in which the chirodactyl Gorgara fought Cal Kestis. A Nightsister there made potions and elixirs. Some were medicine, while others were poisons. By 14 BBY, the carved-in face was covered in moss and vines.
